name: SpiritRadio
0:
”Alexa, ask spirit radio what's playing.”
”Alexa, ask spirit radio to play live.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spirit radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Our programming is upbeat and uplifting, entertaining and inspirational. Spirit Radio looks to play the best contemporary Christian music – plus a selection of positive mainstream hits. News and current affairs are an important part of our station output. The team produce a full service of both national and international news. Our talk shows address the big issues of the day and bring in independent voices who can provide a fresh perspective informed by Christian faith.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
